snippet: Claudia Beqaj hoped to buy an alcove studio or a one-bedroom below 23rd Street for about $400,000.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Claudia Beqaj for a studio or one-bedroom apartment below 23rd Street in Manhattan for about $400,000; found one-bedroom prewar co-op unit in the East Village for $387,000.
lead_paragraph: Claudia Beqaj hoped to buy an alcove studio or a one-bedroom below 23rd Street for about $400,000.

headline.print_headline: A Place of Her Own, No Strings Attached
headline.main: A Place of Her Own, No Strings Attached
